name: Love Island: The Game
description:
Welcome to Love Island The Game! Play as one of the girls on the hit show and live your very own Love Island experience. The choices you make will determine the way the story unfolds, with all the banter, drama and romance of the show.

You'll choose outrageous outfits, play cheeky challenges, and get grafting. And of course, you'll pick your partner in tense recouplings and get the chance to share intimate moments with them.

Have your very own holiday romance in paradise with the first official Love Island mobile game.

Get ready for the hottest summer of your life!
